title: $25RP GIVEAWAY to an active viewer TONIGHT | SLaTerStream
body:
SLaTer is giving a lucky viewer $25 in Riot Points tonight at 4pm GMT+8 (6pm EST).

Be sure to have a twitch account and to be active in chat for your chance to win the money.

This stream is not particularly big so your chance to win is huge!

This is our 4th giveaway in a MONTH!! Get on board people!

-Peace {{summoner:12}}

replies.body: I'm viewing, mate! Good luck and cheers for the generous event you've hosted.
A pleasure. Thanks for the support <3
i won it, thanks man... hasnt arrived yet but im proud...

URF URF URF URF URF URF!!!
Stream is live
Song requests are on so you don't have to listen to my music :D
Come follow, chat, have a good time, and maybe win some cash monies!
Join The SLaTerSquad
